data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi tình cờ gặp cô ấy sáng nay.
data.en_hint: We bumped into her this morning.
data.content_game_1: We bumped into her this morning.
data.answer_en_hint: We bumped into her this morning.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy lúc nào cũng thon thả, ấy vậy mà cô chẳng bao giờ tập luyện cả. Chắc hẳn cơ thể cô ấy trao đổi chất rất nhanh.
data.en_hint: She is always in great shape, yet she rarely works out. She must have a very fast metabolism.
data.content_game_1: She is always in great shape, yet she rarely works out. She must have a very fast metabolism.
data.answer_en_hint: She is always in great shape, yet she rarely works out. She must have a very fast metabolism.

data.trans_hint: Tôi lao ra cửa và vấp phải con chó trên hành lang.
data.en_hint: I rushed for the door and fell over the dog in the hallway.
data.content_game_1: I rushed for the door and fell over the dog in the hallway.
data.answer_en_hint: I rushed for the door and fell over the dog in the hallway.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đột nhiên choáng váng và phải nằm xuống.
data.en_hint: She suddenly came over dizzy and had to lie down.
data.content_game_1: She suddenly came over dizzy and had to lie down.
data.answer_en_hint: She suddenly came over dizzy and had to lie down.

data.trans_hint: Quay lại để tôi nhìn thấy mặt bạn.
data.en_hint: Turn around and let me look at your face.
data.content_game_1: turn around and let me look at your face.
data.answer_en_hint: turn around and let me look at your face.

data.trans_hint: Học sinh trong lớp đứng lên khi giáo viên vào lớp.
data.en_hint: Students in the class got up when the teacher came in.
data.content_game_1: Students in the class got up when the teacher came in.
data.answer_en_hint: Students in the class got up when the teacher came in.

data.trans_hint: Đứng gập mình giúp dãn nhiều các nhóm cơ vùng lưng.
data.en_hint: Bending down helps to stretch many of your back muscles.
data.content_game_1: bending down helps to stretch many of your back muscles.
data.answer_en_hint: bending down helps to stretch many of your back muscles.

data.trans_hint: Do lái xe bất cẩn, Jack đã cán phải một người đi bộ.
data.en_hint: Due to his reckless driving, Jack knocked a pedestrian over.
